server.manager

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.manager.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A Manager that keeps track of all of the users that have connections with the server. When a new user registers, the user will be assigned a unique id. This id will be used to associate them with a certain game when they join it.
    See Also:
    User, Credentials, GameManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static UserManager getInstance()
      Singleton pattern.
      User getUser(int id)
      Gets the user with the specified id.
      User userLogin(Credentials credentials)
      Finds the user in the system that matches the credentials provided and returns the information necessary to set the client's cookie.
      User userRegister(Credentials credentials)
      Registers a new user in the system and gives them a unique id.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static UserManager getInstance()
        Singleton pattern.
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of UserManager.

      • userLogin

        public User userLogin(Credentials credentials)
        Finds the user in the system that matches the credentials provided and returns the information necessary to set the client's cookie.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the login credentials.
        Returns:
        the User that will be used to set the client's cookie.

      • userRegister

        public User userRegister(Credentials credentials)
        Registers a new user in the system and gives them a unique id.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the registration credentials.
        Returns:
        the User that will be used to set the client's cookie.

      • getUser

        public User getUser(int id)
        Gets the user with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player.
        Returns:
        the user associated with the player. Returns null if the user doesn't exist.
